Errors.Error: 未声明标识符 - undeclared identifier
重复声明标识符 - multiply defined identifier
数字中出现了非法字符 - illegal character in number
字符串中出现了非法字符 - illegal character in string
标识符与进程名不匹配 - identifier does not match procedure name
注释没关闭 - comment not closed
缺少等号 - "=" expected
类型定义错误 - type definition starts with incorrect symbol
初始值错误 - value starts with incorrect symbol
陈述错误 - statement starts with incorrect symbol
声明中使用了错误的字符 - declaration followed by incorrect symbol
缺少模块 - MODULE expected
缺少“.” - "." missing
缺少“,” - "," missing
缺少“:” - ":" missing
缺少“)” - ")" missing
缺少“]” - "]" missing
缺少“}” - "}" missing
缺少OF - OF missing
缺少THEN - THEN missing
缺少 DO - DO missing
缺少TO - TO missing
缺少“(” - "(" missing
缺少“:=” - ":=" missing
缺少“，”或者OF - "," or OF expected
EXIT 不在循环中 - EXIT not within loop statement
缺少标识符 - identifier expected
缺少“；” - ";" missing
缺少END - END missing
缺少UNTIL - UNTIL missing
非法标记标识符 - illegally marked identifier
表达式应该是常量 - expression should be constant
常量不是整型 - constant not an integer
标识符没有指明类型 - identifier does not denote a type
标识符没有指明记录类型 - identifier does not denote a record type
进程结果的类型不是一个基本类型 - result type of procedure is not a basic type
进程需要函数 - procedure call of a function
常量不能赋值 - assignment to non-variable
指针没有指向记录或数组类型 - pointer not bound to record or array type
类型被递归定义 - recursive type definition
非法打开数组的参数 - illegal open array parameter
CASE表达式用了错误类型 - wrong type of case label
CASE表达式用了不允许的类型 - inadmissible type of case label
CASE表达式被重复定义 - case label defined more than once
常量赋了非法值 - illegal value of constant
调用参数多于形参 - more actual than formal parameters
调用参数少于形参 - fewer actual than formal parameters
调用数组类型与定义类型不同 - element types of actual array and formal open array differ
被调用的参数不是数组 - actual parameter corresponding to open array is not an array
控制变量必须是整形 - control variable must be integer
参数必须是整形常量 - parameter must be an integer constant
要求指针或变量记录作为形式接受参数 - pointer or VAR record required as formal receiver
指针作为实参 - pointer expected as actual receiver
进程必须与记录的范围一致 - procedure must be bound to a record of the same scope
必须0级进程 - procedure must be of level 0
进程基本类型未知 - procedure unknown in base type
非法调用基本进程 - invalid call of base procedure
这是只读变量 - this variable (field) is read only
Object不是记录 - object is not a record
废弃的对象不是变量 - dereferenced object is not a variable
引用的对象不是变量 - indexed object is not a variable
指数表达式不是整形 - index expression is not an integer
指数值超出了规定范围 - index out of specified bounds
引用的变量不是数组 - indexed variable is not an array
未定义记录的范围 - undefined record field
废弃的变量不是指针 - dereferenced variable is not a pointer
测试类型不是变量类型的扩展 - guard or test type is not an extension of variable type
测试类型不是指针 - guard or testtype is not a pointer
测试变量既不是指针也不是记录的参数变量 - guarded or tested variable is neither a pointer nor a VAR-parameter record
开辟数组不像调用变量，记录和数组元素 - open array not allowed as variable, record field or array element
进程参数 - open lower bound not bound to procedure parameter
记录中不允许出现半动态数组 - semi-dynamic array not allowed in a record
IN的操作数不是整形，或集合 - operand of IN not an integer, or not a set
SET的元素类型不是整形 - set element type is not an integer
<的操作数不是布尔型 - operand of < is not of type BOOLEAN
OR的操作数不是布尔型 - operand of OR is not of type BOOLEAN
操作数不适用于+ - operand not applicable to (unary) +
操作数不适用于- - operand not applicable to (unary) -
<的操作数不是布尔型 - operand of < is not of type BOOLEAN
声明错误 - ASSERT fault
操作数不适用于二元操作符 - incompatible operands of dyadic operator
操作数类型不适用于* - operand type inapplicable to *
操作数类型不适用于/ - operand type inapplicable to /
操作数类型不适用于DIV - operand type inapplicable to DIV
操作数类型不适用于MOD - operand type inapplicable to MOD
操作数类型不适用于+ - operand type inapplicable to +
操作数类型不适用于- - operand type inapplicable to -
操作数类型不适用于=或- - operand type inapplicable to = or #
操作数类型不适合相应的关系 - operand type inapplicable to relation
overriding method must be exported
操作数不是类型 - operand is not a type
操作数不适用于此函数 - operand inapplicable to (this) function
操作数不是变量 - operand is not a variable
不规范的调用 - incompatible assignment
调用的字符串太长 - string too long to be assigned
参数不匹配 - parameter does not match
参数数目不匹配 - number of parameters do not match
结果类型不匹配 - result type does not match
输出标记与声明不符 - export mark does not match with forward declaration
重定义的文本进程应是基本类型 - redefinition textually precedes procedure bound to base type
IF，WHILE，UNTIL，ASSERT的表达式不是布尔型 - type of expression following IF, WHILE, UNTIL or ASSERT is not BOOLEAN
被调用对象不是进程 - called object is not a procedure (or is an interrupt procedure)
调用的变量参数变量不是变量 - actual VAR-parameter is not a variable
调用参数与定义参数不一致 - type of actual parameter is not identical with that of formal VAR-parameter
结果表达式类型不同于进程 - type of result expression differs from that of procedure
CASE的表达式既不是整型也不是字符型 - type of case expression is neither INTEGER nor CHAR
此表达式不能是一个类型或进程 - this expression must not be a type or a procedure
非法使用对象 - illegal use of object
与前述标注不符 - unsatisfied forward reference
与前述进程不符 - unsatisfied forward procedure
WITH表达式没有指明变量 - WITH clause does not specify a variable
函数LEN不适用于数组类型 - LEN not applied to array
LEN的范围太大或为负数 - dimension in LEN too large or negative
初始化不能返回值 - initialiser can not return a value
没有输入SYSTEM - SYSTEM not imported
递归调用了操作符 - recursive call of operator
没有定义操作符 - operator not defined
不允许的变量参数 - VAR-parameter not allowed
重复定义了操作符 - multiply-defined operator
操作符不允许在记录范围内 - operator not allowed in record scope
缺少操作符类型 - operator type missing
操作符没有指明名称 - name does not denote an operator
非法参数个数 - invalid number of formal parameters
记录只能初始化一次 - only one initializer allowed in a record
不允许前述声明 - forward declaration not allowed
操作符必须使用局部声明类型 - operator must use one locally declared argument type
:=操作符：不能是函数 - := operator: cannot be a function
:=操作符：第一个参数必须是变量 - := operator: first parameter must be VAR
输入模块不一致 - key inconsistency of imported module
不正确的文件标识 - incorrect symbol file
输入模块的文件标识没找到 - symbol file of imported module not found
对象或者文件标识没打开 - object or symbol file not opened (disk full?)
不允许递归输入 - recursive import not allowed
不允许生成新的文件标识 - generation of new symbol file not allowed
不匹配调用 - incompatible assignment (declare the record as POINTER TO RECORD)
还没执行 - not yet implemented
集合下界大于上界 - lower bound of set range greater than higher bound
集合元素大于集合允许的最大值或小于0 - set element greater than MAX(SET) or less than 0
数字太大 - number too large
积太大 - product too large
除数是0 - division by zero
和太大 - sum too large
差太大 - difference too large
算术转换时有溢出 - overflow in arithmetic shift
CASE的范围太大 - case range too large
代码太长 - code too long ( > 64 KB)
进程太大 - procedure too large (reduce procedure size)
操作符需要在进程之前声明 - operator should precede procedure declaration
在CASE声明中情形数目太多 - too many cases in case statement
没有足够的寄存器：简化表达式 - not enough registers: simplify expression
没有足够的浮点寄存器：简化表达式 - not enough floating-point registers: simplify expression
参数值非法“（20<=p<256)” - illegal value of parameter "(20 <= p < 256)"
参数值非法“（0<=p<16)” - illegal value of parameter "(0 <= p < 16)"
参数值非法 - illegal value of parameter
在记录中使用了太多指针 - too many pointers in a record
太多全局指针 - too many global pointers
太多记录类型 - too many record types
太多指针类型 - too many pointer types
指针变量地址太长 - address of pointer variable too large (move forward in text)
太多输出或类型进程 - too many exported and/or type-bound procedures
太多输入模块 - too many imported modules
太多输出结构 - too many exported structures
太多嵌套的输入记录 - too many nested records for import
在模块中使用了太多常量 - too many constants (strings) in module
太多外部和/或类型进程 - too many external and/or type-bound procedures
在模块中有太多命令 - too many commands in module
记录扩展等级太高 - record extension hierarchy too high
不允许输出递归类型 - export of recursive type not allowed
过多存取全局变量或常量 - too many accesses to global variables or constants
太多输出变量 - too many exported variables
表示符太长 - identifier too long
字符串太长 - string too long
地址溢出 - address overflow
太多输入变量 - too many imported variables
已经包含了一个唯一的声明模块 - already inside an exclusive statement block
局部变量不允许内嵌汇编进程 - local variables not allowed in inlined assembler procedure
全局条件中有AWAIT- AWAIT with global condition
只允许记录指针 - only allowed for POINTER TO RECORDs
内嵌Oberon进程不能输出 - inlined oberon procedures can not be exported
太多嵌套的函数调用 - too many nested function calls
需要这种记录指针 - pointer to this record required
初始化必须属于一个记录 - initialiser must belong to a record
不能定义活动对象的静态实例 - can not define a static instance of an active object
前述参考活动Oberon - Active Oberon forward reference
活动Oberon方法 - Active Oberon method
活动Oberon释放了声明顺序 - Active Oberon relaxed declaration order
Oberon X 构造返回类型 - Oberon X structured return type
Oberon X 数组 - Oberon X array
只允许在活动对象中使用 - allowed only in active objects
